events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and our team is excited to review your background and skills in detail.
Your application has been categorized under the engineering department, specifically for the software engineering role, moving forward in the recruitment process.
A recruiter specialized in software engineering roles has been assigned to guide you through the interview stages and answer any questions you might have.
We conducted an initial screening call to discuss your experience, technical skills, and career aspirations to ensure alignment with the software engineering role requirements.
You responded promptly, providing detailed answers to our screening questions and expressing enthusiasm for the opportunity to join our engineering team.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for next week, where you will meet with senior engineers to assess your coding and problem-solving skills in a live setting.
